# init(region:elements:options:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new mobile national ID card display request.

## Declaration

```swift
init(region: Locale.Region, elements: [MobileNationalIDCardDisplayRequest.Element] = [], options: MobileNationalIDCardDisplayRequest.Options = .init())
```
title: init(region:elements:options:)
